db:abstract.db:para: The QLineSeries class presents data in line charts.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A line chart is used to show information as a series of data points connected by straight lines.
Creating a basic line chart is simple:

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QLineSeries::QLineSeries(QObject *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: Constructs an empty series object that is a child of parent. When the series object is added to a QChartView or QChart instance, the ownership is transferred.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QLineSeries::~QLineSeries()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the object. Series added to QChartView or QChart instances are owned by the instances and deleted when the instances are destroyed.

db:section.db:title: [override virtual] QAbstractSeries::SeriesType QLineSeries::type() const
db:section.db:para: Reimplements an access function for property: QAbstractSeries::type.
